plot: A Chinese chef (Chef Chu) made the most delicious Kung Pao Chicken in the world. But one day something went terribly wrong. Chef Chu came up with a solution that would change the West forever!
title: Kung Pao Chicken
plot_es: A Chinese chef (Chef Chu) made the most delicious Kung Pao Chicken in the world. But one day something went terribly wrong. Chef Chu came up with a solution that would change the West forever!
plot_en: A Chinese chef (Chef Chu) made the most delicious Kung Pao Chicken in the world. But one day something went terribly wrong. Chef Chu came up with a solution that would change the West forever!
